thread.title: USU Employee Appreciation Day Friday, Sept. 20
thread.title_full: USU Employee Appreciation Day Friday, Sept. 20

author: Utah State University
title: USU Employee Appreciation Day Friday, Sept. 20
text: Utah State Universityâ€™s Employee Appreciation Day will take place Friday, Sept. 20, 2024 at the Maverik Stadium in Logan from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m.. All USU employees (full and part time) are invited to a day of fun, recognition and of course, free food. The event will include free lunch served by the USU leadership, and activities such as a football field goal kick, flu shot clinic, tours of athletic venues, music, exhibitors and more. Employees must bring their USU ID card or A# in order to access the event. Statewide campuses will have additional, separate activities and celebrations for those respective employees. Logan Campus Activities: - Free pizza, drinks and Aggie Ice Cream - Flu Shot Clinic Swag and prizes - Temporary Tattoos: rock your USU spirit with a nonpermanent tattoo - Tours of stadium venues - Field activities, including: - Football field goal kick: imagine yourself as your favorite USU player and see if you can score a field goal - Challenge your friends to a game of corn hole, ladder ball or Kubb - Putting with the USU Police: see if you can score a hole-in-one using a large golf putter - Inflatable football toss and basketball tic tac toe Transportation and ParkingParking will be free at the Stadium. The Aggie Shuttle has several stops near Maverik Stadium to make getting there easy. Check the [map of the Aggie Shuttle](https://utahstate.passiogo.com/) routes for pick-up/drop-off locations. Statewide Campus Activities: - Uintah Basin: BBQ & Outside Activities - Contact: Molly Ellender, [molly.ellender@usu.edu](mailto:molly.ellender@usu.edu?subject=) - Contact: Molly Ellender, - Wasatch Region, Tooele, Kaysville, & Southwest Region: Movie Theatre & Snacks. Previous RSVP required. - Contact: Jana Beckstead, [jana.beckstead@usu.edu](mailto:jana.beckstead@usu.edu?subject=) - Contact: Jana Beckstead, - Blanding: Movie Theatre & Snacks - Contact: Priscilla Arungwa, [priscilla.arungwa@usu.edu](mailto:priscilla.arungwa@usu.edu) - Contact: Priscilla Arungwa, - Eastern: Dutch Oven Lunch with Trivia and Prizes - Contact: Kevin Hurst, [kevin.hurst@usu.edu](mailto:kevin.hurst@usu.edu?subject=) - Contact: Kevin Hurst, - Moab: Lunch at Antica Forma - Contact: Samantha Campbell, [samantha.campbell@usu.edu](mailto:samantha.campbell@usu.edu%20%C2%A0?subject=) - Contact: Samantha Campbell, Employee Appreciation Day is coordinated by the Office of Human Resources with support and sponsorship from several internal and external partners. The goal of this day is to celebrate all faculty and staff by providing some food, fun and formal recognition for all you do for USU and our students. USU Employee Appreciation Day would not be possible without the generous support of our sponsors: TIAA, Fidelity Investments and Blue Cross Blue Shield Regence Comments and questions regarding this article may be directed to the contact person listed on this page.
